text: The Vengeance of Fu Manchu is 1967 British crime thriller movie directed by Jeremy Summers and starring Christopher Lee, Tony Ferrer, Douglas Wilmer, Howard Marion-Crawford, Tsai Chin, Wolfgang Kieling, Suzanne Roquette. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1967 crime movies Category:1967 thriller movies Category:Irish crime movies Category:Irish thriller movies Category:British crime movies Category:British thriller movies Category:Hong Kong crime movies Category:Hong Kong thriller movies Category:German crime movies Category:German thriller movies Category:Singaporean movies
title: The Vengeance of Fu Manchu
